name: illuminated64
description:
illuminated 64

a small puzzle game for the old Commodore64

Play using a joystick in either Port-1 or Port-2. Try to illuminate the whole board. Lighting up one field affects the adjacent fields.

F1 to select difficulty/playfield size.

F3 to reset the board

F5 to randomize the board

Known Bugs: Sometimes Joystick input is interpreted as a keyboard input.
